content:
Hey @T-libs! We have a meeting in about three hours at 2021-05-05T21:00:00+02:00 :tada:

Agenda: https://hackmd.io/YfYTQQFhR1uhiUqjk4s1jw
If there's anything you want to discuss in the meeting, please put it on the agenda :)
regarding "cargo features in std", is there some issue or thread with prior discussion? this is something that I've thought about a fair bit and I'd be interested in being involved
@bstrie There's no specific issue or thread discussing it in general terms. There was discussion in the context of cfg-disabling panicking functions.
